title: Virtual Scanner Appliance for Amazon
extract: Qualys Virtual Scanner Appliance (Pre-Authorized Scanning) HVM. ... The Qualys Virtual Scanner Appliance extends the reach of the Qualys Cloud Platform's integrated suite of security and compliance SaaS applications into the internal networks of both Amazon VPC and classic EC2.
extract_html: Qualys Virtual Scanner Appliance (Pre-Authorized Scanning) HVM. ... The Qualys Virtual Scanner Appliance extends the reach of the Qualys Cloud Platform's integrated suite of security and compliance SaaS applications into the internal networks of both Amazon VPC and classic EC2.
